title: Editor & Proofreader for Blogs, Ebooks, Articles, etc.
description: You finished writing and you're looking for an editor/proofreader. First, congratulations on getting it written! You have a story and a message to convey to your readers that you worked hard on.  Great! Now you might be nervous because you don't want them to misinterpret what you are saying because of a typo, bad grammar, or because English isn't your first language.Maybe you spend too much time looking up how to spell maintenance or conscious that you lose precious writing time. You may still be hesitant to get a editor. Maybe you are afraid they will change your writing too much and it will drown out your own voice. You only want a fresh set of eyes to catch your typos. I can do that.Maybe you want more than that in an editor. You have the basic facts down for the first draft, but you're not sure you said it in a way that will captivate your audience or if it makes sense the way you worded it. This means you need copyediting, which is fixing sentences and rewriting phrases to really make your readers fall in love with you and your writing. I can do that, too.I love reading blogs and books and I have a great eye for noticing small details. So I decided to put my editing skills to work for writers/authors.I get along well with people. I'm on your side. I want your readers to see the real you. Focus on writing and leave the commas to me. Thanks for taking the time to read my overview. If you think I'll be a good fit for you, click on one of the green buttons above to contact me.

title: Passionate Writer and Ruthless Editor

I am sensitive to your changes as we go through the process and committed to getting your project done to the level of your satisfaction.Technical Writing, Proofreading & Editing  My 25 years of experience in technical writing honed my skills and understanding of this specific style of writing. My commitment is to getting your project done the quickest, most efficient way possible, on time and within your budget.   Proofreading & Editing  Your materials will be professionally, meticulously, efficiently and rigorously proofread/edited with suggested changes highlighted in Microsoft Word using the Track Changes feature. By using Microsoft Words Track Changes feature (other options available), you are able to quickly and easily identify and accept proposed changes. I will also match your desired tone (technical, business, academic, conversational) or a combination of those. In addition to simply proofreading and editing, you will benefit from my two decades as a project manager.  As a result, your materials will be proofed not only for spelling and grammatical errors, but also with respect to context. Nothing is quite as embarrassing (in the written word) as a contextual mistake when comes to the topic of travel or real estate and you benefit from my deep experience with this topic. During the assignment I will provide you with intermediate drafts to make sure you are getting exactly the results you want.    Online/Google Research  Everyone knows how to Google, but few know how to properly research topics using Google. Unfortunately too many researchers give you back a ton of information, poorly organized. This can make your job even harder and consume more time than you planned. (And you are assigning this job, in part to say you time!)  I will professionally research your topic, review the results and organize them in a way that makes it easy for you to get right to the heart of the matter.  For all of my projects I provide intermediate results and an outline of my search plan to confirm we are 'on track' and producing the results that will be most valuable to you - organized in a way that is easy to understand.

Professional translations in English, Spanish and French, to ensure that what you want to say is exactly what will be understood from your client or partner in the target language.I work fast and I work well, and have years of experience that make me the most reliable option for your translations. I recently have been solicited for the translation of two different books, as well. To say that Im ecstatic is an understatement. Dreams do come true and so they are for me: traveling, writing, translating and taking photographs have always been intertwined in my life and That Little Agency is enabling me to take this big ball of passions and turn it into a project which allows me to continue to do all of them, not only as hobbies anymore, but as a profession.A wise friend once told me: never underestimate the power of written words. Words transport. Words take you to other dimensions. Words allow you to travel without having to leave the comforts of home. Words expand your mind. Words make you smarter by creating new synapses in your brain and increasing your vocabulary. Words can change lives. Words are an outlet to your deepest thoughts and emotions. Words inspire. The benefits of reading books are infinite and have been widely documented. Writing allows you to express your feeling when spoken words fail you. Writing lets you say the words that need to escape your brain when no one is here to listen. Writing makes ideas travel and turns projects into accomplishments. Words initiate revolutions.I believe that quality content, be it for translations, blogging, newsletters or your website, is key for a business to thrive. Do not let your busy schedule prevent you from getting a kick-ass content: let me help you!
